trans-unit.source: Represents an object type that has a width, height, and <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageMetadata"></xref> such as a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> and a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表物件類型的寬度、 高度和<xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageMetadata"></xref>例如<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>和<xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingImage"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This is an abstract class.
trans-unit.target: 這是 abstract 類別。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageSource"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageSource"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageSource"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageSource"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the height of the image in measure units (96ths of an inch).
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得影像的高度，以測量單位 (96ths 英吋)。

trans-unit.source: The height of the image.
trans-unit.target: 影像的高度。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageMetadata"></xref> associated with the image.
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得<xref href="System.Windows.Media.ImageMetadata"></xref>與影像相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The metadata associated with the image.
trans-unit.target: 與影像相關聯的中繼資料。

trans-unit.source: Converts pixels to DIPs in a way that is consistent with MIL.
trans-unit.target: 軍事與一致的方式將 Dip 像素為單位。

trans-unit.source: Width of the bitmap, in dots per inch.
trans-unit.target: 點陣圖，每英吋的寬度。

trans-unit.source: Width of the bitmap, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 像素為單位指定點陣圖的寬度。

trans-unit.source: The natural size of the bitmap in MIL Device Independent Pixels (DIPs, or 1/96").
trans-unit.target: 自然點陣圖軍事裝置無關的像素 （Dip，或 1/96"） 的大小。

trans-unit.source: Formats the value of the current instance using the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 目前的執行個體使用指定的格式將值格式化。

trans-unit.source: The format to use.
trans-unit.target: 要使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: -or- A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) to use the default format defined for the type of the <xref:System.IFormattable> implementation.
trans-unit.target: -null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 若要使用的類型所定義的預設格式<xref:System.IFormattable>實作。</xref:System.IFormattable>

trans-unit.source: The provider to use to format the value.
trans-unit.target: 要用來格式化值提供者。

trans-unit.source: -or- A null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic) to obtain the numeric format information from the current locale setting of the operating system.
trans-unit.target: -null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中) 從目前的地區設定的作業系統取得的數值格式資訊。

trans-unit.source: The value of the current instance in the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 目前的執行個體中指定的格式的值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this object based on the current culture.
trans-unit.target: 建立此物件目前的文化特性為基礎的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this object.
trans-unit.target: 此物件的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: Creates a string representation of this object based on the <xref:System.IFormatProvider> passed in.
trans-unit.target: 建立此物件為基礎的<xref:System.IFormatProvider>傳入</xref:System.IFormatProvider>的字串表示

trans-unit.source: If the provider is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture*> is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供者<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>、<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture*>用。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.CurrentCulture*>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.IFormatProvider> that supplies culture-specific formatting information.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IFormatProvider>，提供特定文化特性格式資訊。</xref:System.IFormatProvider>

trans-unit.source: A string representation of this object.
trans-unit.target: 此物件的字串表示。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the width of the image in measure units (96ths of an inch).
trans-unit.target: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，取得影像的寬度，以測量單位 (96ths 英吋)。

trans-unit.source: The width of the image in measure units (96ths of an inch).
trans-unit.target: 量值單位影像的寬度 (96ths 英吋)。
